content: of round k2tog now you are going to start working in the round again round 2 k to end of round set up round this will be your bor place a repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 28 marker if you wish k 18 20 22 pick up and 36 sts left k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap break contrast yarn and start working with main cut your working yarn leaving a tail of colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you ladder from the row below and k tbl pm can kitchener stitch your toe closed work row 11 of right/left mint tea pattern pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the 3 mint tea socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together pm place marker knit knit bor beginning of round k tbl knit through back loop sm slip marker purl purl repeat the bracketed sts the number of times indicated ssk slip slip knit mint tea pattern charts left right 4 mint tea socks by debbie ford mint tea pattern written instruction right left round 1 k1 k tbl p2 k3 p1 k20 24 28 round 1 k20 24 28 p1 k3 p2 k tbl k1 round 2 k1 k tbl p2 k1 yo × 2 k1 p2 k3 round 2 k3 p1 k3 4 5 6 times p2 k1 p1 4 5 6 times k3 yo × 2 k1 p2 k tbl k1 round 3 k1 k tbl p2 k5 p1 k20 24 28 round 3 k20 24 28 p1 k5 p2 k tbl k1 round 4 k1 k tbl p2 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p1 round 4 k1 p1 k1 k2 p1 k1 4 5 6 k1 k1 p1 k2 4 5 6 times k1 p1 k1 times k1 p1 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p2 k tbl k1 round 5 k1 k tbl p2 k5 k2tog p1 k20 24 round 5 k20 24 28 p1 ssk k5 p2 k tbl 28 k1 round 6 k1 k tbl p2 k4 k2tog p2 k3 p1 round 6 k3 p1 k3 4 5 6 times p2 ssk 4 5 6 times k3 k4 p2 k tbl k1 round 7 k1 k tbl p2 k3 k2tog p1 k20 24 round 7 k20 24 28 p1 ssk k3 p2 k tbl 28 k1 round 8 k1 k tbl p2 k2 k2tog p1 k1 k1 round 8 k1 p1 k1 k2 p1 k1 4 5 6 p1 k2 4 5 6 times k1 p1 k1 times k1 p1 ssk k2 p2 k tbl k1 round 9 k1 k tbl p2 k1 k2tog p1 k20 24 round 9 k20 24 28 p1 ssk k1 p2 k tbl 28 k1 round 10 k1 k tbl p2 yo k2tog yo p2 k3 round 10 k3 p1 k3 4 5 6 times p2 yo p1 4 5 6 times k3 ssk yo p2
